channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
I am trying to change my home location. I [u][i][b]changed everything I could find in client.java[/b][/i][/u] but it was still in the same old area. Anyone know how to change home location?
P.S: this is a 317 server, and it's reapagescape based.

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

billyjr33:

try looking in the player.java folder thats only if you want them to log in where you want you go there or other wise if you want your teleports to be changed go to clickingmost.java and look for the name of the teleport and change the x,y croods and after that save then go to texthandler.java and search the name of the teleport that u want to change the name like this if the teleport is monsters and you want it to be called home then do ctrl+f or h and search for monsters and then change it to home then save and compile then your done hoped i helped.

It was in player.java;
Thanks for your help;
moderators please lock this topic.

Read full topic
